name: FakeValuesService_primitiveToWrapperTest
description: Unit tests for the primitiveToWrapper method in the FakeValuesService class.

test_cases.name: testPrimitiveToWrapper_Primitive
test_cases.description: Tests the conversion of a primitive class (int.class) to its wrapper class (Integer.class).

test_cases.name: testPrimitiveToWrapper_NonPrimitive
test_cases.description: Tests the conversion of a non-primitive class (String.class) to itself.

test_cases.name: testPrimitiveToWrapper_Null
test_cases.description: Tests the conversion when the input class is null.
